## AsyncTapHook class

Abstract Async Hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class AsyncTapHook<T, R> extends Hook<T, R> 
```

## Remarks

Providing `tapAsync` and `tapPromise` methods for asynchronous hooks

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [tapAsync(fn, bucket)](./hamon.asynctaphook.tapasync.md) |  | listen to hook in async callback mode |
|  [tapPromise(fn, bucket)](./hamon.asynctaphook.tappromise.md) |  | listen to hook in async promise mode |
